shareUrl.tooltipMessage: Share the page link with your colleagues. Be aware, that your colleague needs the correct access rights to see the page.
shareUrl.toastSuccessMessage: Link copied to clipboard. Be aware, that your colleague needs the correct access rights to see the page.

resetTable.tooltip: Reset table to its default settings

additionalInformation.title: Additional Information
additionalInformation.selectionStatus: You selected a component / workstep without any subelements.
additionalInformation.selectionHint: Please choose a assembly with at least one subelement to display the chart.

unsupportedBrowser.title: Your browser is not supported
unsupportedBrowser.message: CDBA does not support your browser. Some features might not work properly. Please use the latest versions of Chrome or Microsoft Edge. Contact your IV coordinator if you need support/ admin rights to install a new browser.

content.main: We’d like to inform you that CDBA has officially become a Schaeffler product 🎉 🎊 🍾 . You have until the 1st of October before we start charging your department. If you don’t want to continue using CDBA, you can delete account using the button below.
Are you sure you want to delete your account? You will loose all access to CDBA and its functionality starting 1st of October.

drawings.title: Technical Drawings: {{material}}
drawings.notFoundErrorMessage: Unfortunately, we couldn't find a technical drawing for this product. As an alternative, you can find technical drawings inside SAP using the transaction CDESK.
drawings.upcomingPreviewFeatureTeaserMessage: We're working on a feature to display a preview of the technical drawing. Meanwhile you can download them.

languageSelect.label: Select language
languageSelect.hint: Please select the language for the application

localizationSelect.label: Select localization
localizationSelect.hint: Affects number separators and date format
localizationSelect.tooltip:
Example German localization:
Dates: 22.01.2021, Large numbers: 2.893,32€

Example US localization:
Dates: 01/22/2021, Large numbers: 2,893.32€
